problem.markdown:
Identify the correct statement from the following. () PMOS passes from source to drain when logic 1 is applied to gate. (x) NMOS passes from source to drain when logic 1 is applied to gate () PMOS always passes from source to drain whatever be the gate input () NMOS always passes from source to drain whatever be the gate input
What can be designed using pass transistors? () Any combinational logic () Multiplexer (x) Both () None
Will n pass transistor and complementary pass transistor behave similarly for passing one? () No (x) Yes () May be in some situations () can not say
_______ input mux can be formed using n select lines. () n () 2*n (x) 2n () None of the above
Which gives good zero () Nmos Pass transistor (x) Both pmos and complementary pass transistor () Pmos pass transistor () None of the above
problem.p: Identify the correct statement from the following.

choicegroup.choice: PMOS passes from source to drain when logic 1 is applied to gate.
NMOS passes from source to drain when logic 1 is applied to gate
PMOS always passes from source to drain whatever be the gate input
NMOS always passes from source to drain whatever be the gate input

problem.p: What can be designed using pass transistors?
Will n pass transistor and complementary pass transistor behave similarly for passing one?
_______ input mux can be formed using n select lines.

choicegroup.choice: Both pmos and complementary pass transistor
